questions.question: Write an email to a friend congratulating them on getting a place at their dream university.
Write an email inviting a friend to a small birthday weekend and give the main details.
keyPoints: Invite them and give the dates
Ask them to confirm and suggest alternatives

questions.question: Write an email apologising to a friend for missing their important event and suggest how to make up for it.
keyPoints: Suggest a way to make it up

questions.question: Write an email to a friend who is nervous about studying abroad, giving advice and reassurance.
keyPoints: Reassure them and normalise their nerves
Give practical advice for the first weeks
Suggest how to prepare before leaving

questions.question: Write an email arranging a day trip with a friend, offering options and asking for their preferences.
keyPoints: Suggest a plan with times and activities
Ask for their preferences and confirm details
